contract_not_deployed: Eterney contract is not deployed to detected network. Try Ethereum Mainnet
bio: Tell us a little about the person
please_confirm_transaction: Please confirm the transaction in your wallet
name_added: Name added to the memory wall
project_description1: ETERNEY is a decentralized memory wall that honors loved ones who have passed.
project_description2: Loosing someone you love is never easy. Death often leaves a void nobody can heal. Just because your loved one has passed away doesn't mean they'll disappear from your life or the world completely.
project_description3: ETERNEY smart contract makes sure their memory stays alive forever on Ethereum Blockchain.
guide_description: Every time ETERNEY app loads, it selects random names from the smart contract and displays them on the memory wall. To see your memory wall, you need to connect your wallet.
click_to_connect: Connect your Ethereum wallet / display connected account information
click_to_add: Add a person to the memory wall (your wallet must be connected)
there_are_control: There are buttons in the upper right corner of the application:
please_ensure: Please ensure the information above is correct. You won't be able to edit or delete it once it's added.
then_find_and_tap: Then find and tap "Add to Home Screen"
